about_the_game:
Hail to the 12th and latest hero of Caelum. We are at war and you have been chosen to fight for our world by the Goddess herself. It’s a special privilege, and you are expected to head into the front lines immediately.

Can you succeed where once greater heroes fail before?



Eternal Hearts: Curse of the Endless is a genre fusion of deckbuilding games and action games, giving it a unique battle system that tests both your tactical wit and your reflexes.

Tactics to Action Battle System


Freely switch between intense, real-time action and time-stopping tactical breathers where you can reload your arsenal.

End Your Curse

Fight off waves of enemies in a journey through twisted forests, great cliffs, barren deserts, and beyond to end your curse. Having been cursed by the dark lord himself, you have lost all your heroic powers from the Goddess. Fortunately not all is lost, since you now have the new-found ability to absorb your enemies' dark powers.


Liberate Legendary Heroes

Conquer the darkness with the help of your predecessors: each with legends of their own. Remember, they have your best interest at heart, but first, you need to free them from their cursed binds.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: ETERNAL HEARTS: Curse of the Endless is an action deckbuilding rogue-like where each battle lets you switch between intense, real-time action and time-stopping tactical breathers. Absorb your enemies' powers, liberate the souls of your predecessors and finally, end your curse.
